original_text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord, and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 마침 이 때에 나아와서 하나님께 감사하고 예루살렘의 속량을 바라는 모든 사람에게 그에 대하여 말하니라

sentences.original_text: And she coming in that instant
gave thanks likewise unto the Lord
and spake of him to all them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 이들에게 그분에 대해 말했다

sentences.original_text: that looked for redemption in Jerusalem
